meanings.sent1: The peskiness of the buzzing mosquito kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: Her constant peskiness made it hard to focus on my work.
meanings.sent3: The peskiness of the playful puppy was endearing rather than irritating.
meanings.sent4: The peskiness of the dripping faucet echoed through the silent house.
meanings.sent5: The peskiness of the persistent sales calls was like a never-ending storm.

meanings.definition: The quality of being bothersome or irritating
meanings.sent1: I couldn't stand the peskiness of the squeaky door every time it opened.
meanings.sent2: The peskiness of the traffic jam made me late for my appointment.
meanings.sent3: Despite its peskiness, the broken alarm clock still managed to wake me up.
meanings.sent4: The peskiness of the dripping faucet seemed to mock my failed attempts to fix it.
meanings.sent5: The peskiness of the persistent itch was driving me crazy.
